attributes.action: To Secure The Freedom Of Gillian Gibbons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that calling a Teddy bear Mohammad is no different than naming your child Mohammad. If it was against the Muslim religeon then no Muslim should be named Mohammad.
If this continues we believe there could be a backlash against Sudanese people living peacefully in the Uk, this would be a tragedy.
We ask the government to act swiftly to ensure the release of Gillian Gibbons.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
